title: 93/152/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 February 1993 laying down the criteria for vaccines to be used against Newcastle disease in the context of routine vaccination programmes
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 February 1993 laying down the criteria for vaccines to be used against Newcastle disease in the context of routine vaccination programmes
(93/152/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The present Decision shall apply from 1 January 1995.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 February 1993.
For the Commission
